name: Ext_R5_GuidanceResponse_dataRequirement
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.GuidanceResponse.dataRequirement for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents GuidanceResponse.dataRequirement from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/GuidanceResponse|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: If the evaluation could not be completed due to lack of information, or additional information would potentially result in a more accurate response, this element will a description of the data required in order to proceed with the evaluation. A subsequent request to the service should include this data.
element.comment: `GuidanceResponse.dataRequirement` maps to R4B `GuidanceResponse.dataRequirement`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
